workout_groups.name: Beginner Foam Rolling
workout_groups.description: Basic foam rolling techniques for muscle relaxation and improved mobility.

workouts.name: Back Roll
workouts.description: Roll gently along your upper and mid-back to release tension.

workouts.name: Calf Roll
workouts.description: Roll from the ankle to just below the knee to loosen the calf muscles.

workouts.name: Quad Roll
workouts.description: Lie face down and roll from the hip to the knee to release tight quads.

workouts.name: Hamstring Roll
workouts.description: Sit with the foam roller under your hamstrings and roll gently from knee to hip.

workouts.name: Glute Roll
workouts.description: Sit on the foam roller and roll back and forth to relieve glute tightness.

workouts.name: IT Band Roll
workouts.description: Roll along the outside of the thigh to target the IT band.

workout_groups.name: Recovery & Deep Tissue Foam Rolling
workout_groups.description: More advanced foam rolling techniques to break up deep muscle knots and improve recovery.

workouts.name: Thoracic Extension Roll
workouts.description: Roll slowly on the upper back while pausing to extend over the foam roller.

workouts.name: Lateral Quad Roll
workouts.description: Roll at an angle across the quads to release deeper tension.

workouts.name: Glute Trigger Point Release
workouts.description: Use slow movements and pause on tight spots to release glute knots.

workouts.name: Adductor Roll
workouts.description: Lie on your stomach and roll along the inside of the thigh for deep tissue release.

workouts.name: Lower Back Release
workouts.description: Roll gently along the lower back, avoiding excess pressure on the spine.

workouts.name: Chest & Shoulder Opener
workouts.description: Lay on the foam roller lengthwise and let arms fall open to stretch the chest and shoulders.

workout_groups.name: Performance & Mobility Foam Rolling
workout_groups.description: High-level foam rolling techniques designed to improve movement efficiency and prevent injuries.

workouts.name: Rolling Plank Challenge
workouts.description: Hold a plank position while rolling the foam roller under different muscle groups.

workouts.name: Advanced IT Band Release
workouts.description: Use small, controlled rolls and hold on tight trigger points to increase mobility.

workouts.name: Active Hip Opener
workouts.description: Roll deep into the hip flexors while performing active mobility drills.

workouts.name: Single-Leg Foam Roller Balance
workouts.description: Balance on one foot while rolling the other leg to improve stability and mobility.

workouts.name: Dynamic Thoracic Mobilization
workouts.description: Roll through the upper back while actively reaching overhead for full thoracic expansion.

workouts.name: Explosive Foam Rolling Transitions
workouts.description: Move rapidly between different rolling positions, integrating core stability and control.
